conversations.description: Employee asks for the latest travel reimbursement policy and the bot returns the most recent version with a brief summary.
HR representative queries the onboarding checklist for new hires in the Engineering department, filtered by confidentiality level.
Salesperson requests the pricing tiers for a specific product line and the bot pulls the pricing guide PDF and highlights key tiers.
Project manager seeks the decision outcomes from the Q3 strategy meeting, and the bot fetches the transcript and summarizes action items.
Legal counsel checks the data‑privacy policy effective on a given date and receives the exact clause changes since the prior version.
Finance analyst asks for the expense approval workflow for marketing expenses, and the bot returns a step‑by‑step flowchart excerpt from the wiki.
Support engineer looks up the troubleshooting guide for a known issue with the internal ticketing system, filtered by product team.
Intern requests the corporate branding guidelines PDF and the bot verifies the intern role before delivering the document.
Product owner asks for the feature request backlog discussed in the last sprint planning meeting; the bot fetches the transcript and lists prioritized items.
Security officer queries the latest security incident response playbook and receives a concise summary of the steps with version number.
Marketing manager wants to know the approved social‑media usage policy and the bot returns the relevant policy text with bullet‑point highlights.
IT admin asks for the password‑policy requirements for privileged accounts; the bot checks role permissions and provides the policy excerpt.
Executive asks for the most recent quarterly earnings call transcript and a summary of key financial metrics.
Team lead asks for the remote‑work eligibility criteria for employees in the APAC region, filtered by location metadata.
Compliance officer requests a list of all documents tagged with "confidential" and "GDPR" to verify audit readiness.

Employee wonders about the process for filing a workplace harassment complaint; the bot provides the step‑by‑step policy with links.

Developer wants to know the code‑review checklist for the backend team, and the bot returns the latest checklist markdown.

HR asks for the maternity leave entitlement for part‑time employees in Europe, filtered by employment type.
Product marketing asks for the approved messaging framework for the new product launch, and the bot sends the approved slide deck summary.
Legal counsel needs the clause on third‑party data sharing in the vendor agreement and the bot extracts the exact paragraph.
Employee asks for the steps to request a new software license, with the bot verifying the requester’s department before returning the workflow.
Executive assistant requests a list of upcoming board meeting dates and associated agenda items from the calendar transcript store.

Sales executive wants to know the discount approval thresholds for enterprise deals, filtered by sales tier.

Engineer asks for the approved library versions for the Java stack, and the bot pulls the version matrix from the tech wiki.
Executive requests a summary of all policy changes made in the last 30 days across all departments.
Recruiter asks for the interview scheduling policy for international candidates, including time‑zone considerations.

Product owner queries the definition of ‘Ready for Development’ in the agile workflow wiki.
